channel.title: math.RA updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.RA updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Co-first modules
item.description: arXiv:2505.04734v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: This paper explores the concept of \textbf{co-first modules}, a generalization of coprime modules, through the lens of preradicals in module theory. Building on foundational notions such as second modules and coprime modules, we introduce new submodule products and characterize coprime modules using these products. The study extends classical definitions by defining \textbf{$\mathscr{A}$-co-first modules} and \textbf{$\mathscr{A}$-fully co-first modules}, which utilize subclasses of preradicals to broaden the scope of coprimeness. Additionally, we investigate the lattice structure of conatural classes and their closure properties, providing conditions under which co-first modules coincide with second modules. The paper also examines the implications of these concepts in the context of left MAX rings and left perfect rings, offering a comparative analysis of coprimeness and secondness. Our results try to contribute to a deeper understanding of module theory and its applications, while highlighting connections between preradicals, module classes, and ring properties.
item.dc:creator: Rinc\'on-Mej\'ia Hugo Alberto, Garc\'ia-Mora Luis Fernando

item.title: Supernilpotent Semirings
item.description: arXiv:2410.09271v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We prove that supernilpotent and nilpotent semirings with absorbing zero are the same and provide a necessary and sufficient condition for supernilpotency (nilpotency).
item.dc:creator: Neboj\v{s}a Mudrinski, Milica \v{S}obot

item.title: The Metaplectic Representation is Faithful
item.description: arXiv:2401.04581v3 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We develop methods to show that infinite-dimensional modules over the Iwasawa algebra $KG$ of a uniform pro-p group are faithful and apply them to show that the metaplectic representation for the symplectic group is faithful.
item.dc:creator: Christopher Chang, Simeon Hellsten, Mario Marcos Losada, Sergiu Novac
